text: Drama from Ancient Life () is a 1971 Soviet drama movie directed by Ilya Averbakh.Елена Соловей: За тем, как растут внуки, наблюдаю из Америки по скайпуДрама из старинной жизни It stars Yelena Solovey, Anatoly Yegorov, and Yevgeny Perov. == Actors == * Yelena Solovey as Lyuba * Anatoly Yegorov as Arkady * Yevgeny Perov as Count Kamensky * Sofya Pavlova as Drosida * Aleksandr Khlopotov as Kamensky Jr. * Lyudmila Arinina as mammy * Rasmi Djabrailov as Khraposhka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ilya Averbakh
title: Drama from Ancient Life
